verbose_text: Dalziel kinetic analysis has also shown that the peroxiredoxin reduction and oxidation reactions for Schistosoma mansoni peroxiredoxin 1 can essentially be described by two independent mass action reactions [XREF_BIBR], and, in a model of hemoglobin oxidation in red cells, the reduction of hydrogen peroxide by peroxiredoxin II could be modeled effectively with mass action kinetics [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: reduction of hydrogen peroxide by peroxiredoxin
